aircraft.value: Stormbird Attack - AC-2510-329 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Door latch mechanism failure to engage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 08/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 09/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 13/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 13/10/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 13/10/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
